Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: It's a popular place so better go early. üòä Liked their toasties, their tea and chocolate! I don't drink coffee anymore, but my friend who tried said it's tasty! Nice atmosphere and friendly staff! ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: The coffee wasn't hot an they should be ashamed for the grilled cheese sandwich they served. Will never visit the Koffie Academie again and would advise everyone to stay away. And the young lady behind the counter should learn some basic greetings for potential new customers who don't use Google maps.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text:
Rarely, very rarely, I give out a five stars, but this time I really must.

Welcome to Koffie Academie, this quirky hipster cafe where brewed with mastery ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: I dined here on Friday afternoon, it was a very cosy place and the guy who was preparing and serving was nice. ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text:
Can't fault anything. Great presentation and tasty coffee. Also a good selection of cakes, toasties and fresh juices.
I came back here after some time and found a new welcoming staff which makes the place very friendly. Highly recommended! Gezellig!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Very tasty coffee and nice atmosphere. But chicken sandwich was too dry.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Friendly young owners, making you feel at home. They recently opened so they probably still need some experience and time to refine the offer, that during my visit was a bit limited. Great coffee!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: So nice I stopped in twice.  Great vibe.  Great tea.  Great pastries.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: My favourite coffee in Amsterdam - always with a choice of 2 or 3 different beans. Do proper flat whites and cortados and the guys in there are lovely too. Proper coffee.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: lovely atmosphere. Very cozy. Very nice and kind young girls who work here, may not be professional waitresses or bartenders, I‚Äôd argue it‚Äôs a bit of this place‚Äôs charm. The ‚Äúsnack‚Äù of toasted chicken sandwich, is good to try; however, the ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Don't know if it was because I was hungry but the coffee here gave me goosebumps. The toastie I got (mushrooms) was also a bliss to eat. Would recommend!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Great place for coffee but a little bit expensive. The service is top notch, the vibe is excellent especially if you are here to work on your laptop.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Nice cosy place, good barista, quick, attending and good service, had cappuccino so need to go back to try an espresso. Nice music and good vibe in the store. Also for to go.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Great ambience, and amazing coffee and fresh pastry! üòä also a fantastic work station for a few hours:)

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Absolutely a great choice especially if you're a coffee addict. Because they definitely know what they're doing and you can get the real taste of coffee with alternative brewing techniques. Plus Vegan friendly*

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Lovely chilled atmosphere, friendly service, and great coffee. Filter available (v60, aeropress) as well as the usual espresso fare. It's a great espresso tho!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Exceptionally good coffee, nice ambient feeling and super sweet people working there. Food is also amazing. Love to go here.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: I really think this might have been the best flat white I have ever had. Its so great! And the price is really low as well for such a great cup of coffee. I came here in May 2017 on my first trip to Amsterdam and had to make sure to come back during my second trip!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: This place is honestly fabulous. Me and a friend were in Amsterdam for three days, found this place on the first day and went back every single day. Everyone is so friendly and after the first day our order was remembered and referred to as ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Very cosy place... the coffee is great as is this goat cheese toast... you could lay back and let your senses take over... Your soul will appreciate it!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Cannot talk about coffee quality, but the food was, for a 8,80Euro sandwich, really letting me down. A Chicken Sandwich with Avocado and Cheese for that price just raises expectations to a fresh and nice sandwich. See yourself, what I got.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Nice homemade foods, vegan options for those interested and great coffee. Great team!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Great service and good old fashioned coffee.  The banana bread is amazing!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Great great coffee! Very Friendly service. We always go one of the beat coffee shop in Nuremberg- the taste is so similar!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Coffee - fruity style (not so so what I like) . Had with a croissant - not many options but nice looking ones. Lovely atmosphere. Fine fine

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Great coffee, great place, great people üëå

Review Text: My latte place to go in the whole city even if I live on the other part. Well-balanced Malabar monsoon with non-sweet milk. Pure joy and happiness.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Great atmosphere, nice baristas, tasty coffee and sandwiches. Highly recommend.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Very nice vibe to the Cafe and the coffee was just perfect.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Always a good choice if you want coffee and a cozy place. They also have few healthy food options for breakfast. Indeed great spot for working from the dam

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: This place is spectacular! Great food and great coffee.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: One of the best coffee joints in Amsterdam. Love the rusty looking interior design, the laid-back vibe and the friendliness of the staff. Overall a brilliant little place to cozy up with a person you care about, or do some remote working.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Such a great flat white, highly recommend to visit this coffee place.

Name: Koffie Academie

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Pretty good vibe in here. The cakes are dry. I suspect that is the style of bananna bread in Amsterdam. Tasty nonetheless.

Name: Koffie Academie

Review Text: Coffee is tasty and delicious. Perfect service and cosy ambiance.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Great place, perfect place to have a small breakfast, very nice owner, and good coffee

Review Text: A splendid cozy place with remarkably friendly staff and great snacks, besides wonderful coffee.

Review Text: A coffee lovers paradise. This place is passionate about their coffee. The aeropress coffee is exceptional. The atmosphere is very relaxed and is a lovely place to wile away a few hours. We also sampled their toasted goats cheese flatbread ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: The best coffee in Amsterdam, hands down.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Had a super good iced latte served by a wonderful barista! Amazing quality and the price is (relatively) cheap, I payed ‚Ç¨3.50 for my latte with oat milk. Would definitely recommend if you want great coffee and awesome atmosphere!

Name: Koffie Academie

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: A lovely coffee place. A chilled out, relaxed atmosphere which is a blessing for me and my morning coffee. Prices were not too expensive in my opinion. Coffee was very tasty and cold drinks satisfyingly refreshing.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: During our short stay in Amsterdam, we had our daily morning coffee here. Super cozy. Friendly staff. All types of milk available. Yummy coffee. If you try one thing: monkey magic granola with coconut yogurt!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Great coffee! And one of the guys working there took time to sit down for a minute to chat. Very laid back. My new favorite coffee spot in Amsterdam

Name: Koffie Academie

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Incredible Cappuccino- probably the best in Amsterdam!!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Absolutely love this place! Their coffee is extraordinarily good (one can also choose between different beans) and for me, the quality is definitively worth the slightly above average prices

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: Koffie Academie should be on the bucket list of every serious coffee aficionado . Here you can enjoy an espresso or beautifully  adorned cappuccino in a charming chilled out  area overlooking the busy going-ons of the Overtoom at the front ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie Academie

Name: Koffie Academie

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: My barista days have long passed, but I still refuse to settle for less than brewed with know how and love for the coffee. This is my to go to place when I want an Americano. I am sure they make awesome espresso, because you can't make the one without the other, but I just love their tall cup of joe.

Review Text: Visited on a Saturday for a light lunch. Flat white was delicious - right proportions and excellent micro-foam. Food selection was disappointing and service was confused and a bit overly familiar. Would come back for the coffee though!

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Small, cozy and one of the tastiest coffees from Amsterdam. Tip: ask the barista to surprise you. So I got a flat white with coconut milk which from now on really is my favorite drink! ‚Ä¶

Review Text:
(Translated by Google) Good explanation about the different ways of making coffee. Now no latte or capacino taken.

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: (Translated by Google) In the Coffee Academy the staff is lazy and very slow. That shows every time. Every once in a while people look at a smartphone and every action seems to happen in slow motion. Moreover, you also pay the main price ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie Academie
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The coffee is moderate, for that price you expect a very good coffee. If you then also have to wait a long time for this, then you know: I will not come here anymore. ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie Academie
